std::string @51::formatNumber ( uint32  number,
uint32  width,
char  fill = ' ',
char  thousands = ',' 
) [static]

This nicely formats a number.

Parameters:
number The number to format.
width The width of the resultant string. This may be expanded if this number is too small and the number large.
fill The character to use for spacing.
thousands The character to use for a separators between thousand units. If this is NULL then no separator is is used.
